definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Pr 4:2 learning, teaching ( concrete; prob. what is received );—´[[ל]] abs. Is 29:24 + 5 t.; sf. [[לִקְחִי]] De 32:3, Job 11:4 ; [[לִקְחָהּ]] Pr 7:21; —

instruction, subjective, as personal acquirement; [[יִלְמְדוּ לֶָקַח]] Is 29:24, they shall learn instruction (‖[[בִּינׇה]]); [[וְיוֹסֶף לֶָקַח]] Pr 1:5 a wise man will hear and will increase (his) learning, so Pr 9:9.

teaching, obj., as thing taught, [[יַעֲרׂף כַּמָּטָר]] [[לִקְחִי]] De 32:2 (‖[[אִמְרָתִי]]), Job 11:4 ; [[טוֹב נׇתַתִּי לָכֶם]] ´[[ל]] Pr 4:2 ; also = teaching-power, persuasiveness, ´[[מֶתֶק שְׂפָתַיִם יוֹסִיף ל]] Pr 16:21 sweetness of lips increaseth persuasiveness (v. [[מתק]]), [[וְעַל שְׂפָתָיו יוֹסִיף]] [[לֶקַח]] v:Pr 16:23; in bad sense, of seductive words of adulteress, ´[[בְּרׂב ל]] Pr 7:21 (‖[[בְּחֵלֶק שְׂפָתֶיהָ]]).
